name: Jumping Duck
description:
This Game was made for the 84th Mini Jam, with the theme: Bubbles. This is the first GameJam I've participated in and also my 2nd Game I've ever made.

In this game you're controlling a little toy duck and the goal is to reach the end of the level by jumping up the bubbles until the end.

The Game isn't finished yet, but definetly playable. I'm going to release the Updates as soon as possible, but I hope that you still have fun and have a nice day.
